intro: An unusual trainer with all kinds of Bug paraphernalia blocks your way!
intro_dialogue:
Hey, trainer! I'm on a mission to find the rarest Bug Pokémon in existence!$You must love Bug Pokémon too, right?
Everyone loves Bug Pokémon!
title: The Bug-Type Superfan
speaker: Bug-Type Superfan
description:
The trainer prattles, not even waiting for a response...

It seems the only way to get out of this situation is by catching the trainer's attention!

1.label: Offer to Battle
1.tooltip:
(-) Challenging Battle
(+) Teach a Pokémon a Bug Type Move
1.selected:
A challenge, eh?
My bugs are more than ready for you!

2.label: Show Your Bug Types
2.disabled_tooltip: You need at least 1 Bug Type Pokémon on your team to select this.
2.selected: You show the trainer all your Bug Type Pokémon...
2.selected_0_to_1: Huh? You only have {{numBugTypes}}...$Guess I'm wasting my breath on someone like you...
2.selected_2_3:
Hey, you've got {{numBugTypes}} Bug Types!
Not bad.$Here, this might help you on your journey to catch more!
2.selected_4_to_5:
What? You have {{numBugTypes}} Bug Types?
Nice!$You're not quite at my level, but I can see shades of myself in you!
$Take this, my young apprentice!
2.selected_6:
Whoa! {{numBugTypes}} Bug Types!
$You must love Bug Types almost as much as I do!$Here, take this as a token of our camaraderie!

3.label: Gift a Bug Item
3.tooltip:
(-) Give the trainer a {{requiredBugItems}}
(+) Receive a Gift Item
3.disabled_tooltip: You need to have a {{requiredBugItems}} to select this.
3.invalid_selection: Pokémon doesn't have that kind of item.
3.selected_dialogue:
Whoa! A {{selectedItem}}, for me?
You're not so bad, kid!$As a token of my appreciation,
I want you to have this special gift!$It's been passed all through my family, and now I want you to have it!

battle_won:
Your knowledge and skill were perfect at exploiting our weaknesses!$In exchange for the valuable lesson,
allow me to teach one of your Pokémon a Bug Type Move!
teach_move_prompt: Select a move to teach a Pokémon.
confirm_no_teach: You sure you don't want to learn one of these great moves?
outro:
I see great Bug Pokémon in your future!
May our paths cross again!$Bug out!
